params.name: chat_template
params.description: A Jinja template or the name of a template to use for this conversion.It is usually not necessary to pass anything to this argument,as the models template will be used by default.

params.name: tools
params.description: A list of tools (callable functions) that will be accessible to the model. If the template does notsupport function calling, this argument will have no effect. Each tool should be passed as a JSON Schema,giving the name, description and argument types for the tool. See ourchat templating guidefor more information.
